metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20365 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
LibRaw::raw2image() in libraw_cxx.cpp has a heap-based buffer overflow.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-20365` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libraw-bin - 0.17.1-1ubuntu0.5
libraw15 - 0.17.1-1ubuntu0.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: darktable: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
